metadata.description: Uniswap Developer AI Toolkit - Comprehensive AI-powered development workflows for implementation planning, code review, PR management, codebase exploration, and external service integrations.

plugins.name: development-planning
plugins.description: Implementation planning and execution workflows with multi-agent collaboration

plugins.name: development-pr-workflow
plugins.description: Pull request management including review, creation, issue resolution, and Graphite stack management

plugins.name: development-codebase-tools
plugins.description: Codebase exploration, refactoring, and quality analysis

plugins.name: development-productivity
plugins.description: Documentation, research, test generation, and prompt optimization tools

plugins.name: uniswap-integrations
plugins.description: External service integrations (Linear, Notion, Nx, Chrome DevTools) and deployment orchestration
